title: Red Panda Lobster shells boost Shimano brake performance with extra seal protection
content:
Component makers Red Panda’s red Lobster kit promises to protect your Shimano mountain bike brakes from the dreaded wandering bite point by sealing out dust, water,  and debris contamination. By adding an extra rubber boot to the pushrod that drives the piston inside the master cylinder, the Lobster is said to ensure consistent brake action […]

The post Red Panda Lobster shells boost Shimano brake performance with extra seal protection appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
